languages.text: {n}Арлекин зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках, а затем обращается к вам.{/n} "С удовольствием исполню вашу общую просьбу. Но не думай, что тебе рады на Первом Мире больше, чем трехоким мон-кай. Ты вол{mf|ен|ьна} уйти сразу же, как закончится песнь по погибшим. И лишь потому, что {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}некоторые из моих братьев и сестер считают тебя занятн{mf|ым|ой}{/d}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Арлекин зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках, а затем обращается к вам.{/n} "С удовольствием исполню вашу общую просьбу. Но не думай, что тебе рады на Первом Мире больше, чем трехоким мон-кай. Ты вол{mf|ен|ьна} уйти сразу же, как закончится песнь по погибшим. И лишь потому, что некоторые из моих братьев и сестер считают тебя занятн{mf|ым|ой}".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}The Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands and says to you,{/n} "It will be my pleasure to satisfy your request. But do not think that you are any more welcome on the Crone World than the three-eyed mon-keigh. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Арлекин зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках, а затем обращается к вам.{/n} "С удовольствием исполню вашу общую просьбу. Но не думай, что тебе рады на Первом Мире больше, чем трехоким мон-кай. Ты вол{mf|ен|ьна} уйти сразу же, как закончится песнь по погибшим. И лишь потому, что {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}некоторые из моих братьев и сестер считают тебя занятн{mf|ым|ой}{/d}".

And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}."

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンは手にしていた見慣れぬ装置のボタンを押したまま、あなたに語りかける。{/n}「君の望みに答えられて嬉しいよ。だが、老朽惑星に受け入れられるとは思うなよ、三つ目のモン＝ケイとお前は違う。葬送歌が聞こえたらさっさと立ち去れ。そうしないと、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}僕の兄弟にもてあそばれちゃうからね{/d}」
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands and says to you,{/n} "It will be my pleasure to satisfy your request. But do not think that you are any more welcome on the Crone World than the three-eyed mon-keigh. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンは手にしていた見慣れぬ装置のボタンを押したまま、あなたに語りかける。{/n}「君の望みに答えられて嬉しいよ。だが、老朽惑星に受け入れられるとは思うなよ、三つ目のモン＝ケイとお前は違う。葬送歌が聞こえたらさっさと立ち去れ。そうしないと、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}僕の兄弟にもてあそばれちゃうからね{/d}」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}丑角按住手中古怪装置的按钮，对你开了口。{/n}“我很愿意满足你的要求，不过，别以为为老妪世界会欢迎你。等到哀歌响起，你们就要离开了。你之所以能活着离开这里，不过是因为{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}我一部分兄弟姐妹觉得你很有趣{/d}罢了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands and says to you,{/n} "It will be my pleasure to satisfy your request. But do not think that you are any more welcome on the Crone World than the three-eyed mon-keigh. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}丑角按住手中古怪装置的按钮，对你开了口。{/n}“我很愿意满足你的要求，不过，别以为为老妪世界会欢迎你。等到哀歌响起，你们就要离开了。你之所以能活着离开这里，不过是因为我的部分兄弟姐妹觉得你很有趣罢了。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}L'Arlequin appuie sur un bouton de l'étrange appareil qu'il tient en main, puis vous dit :{/n} « C'est avec plaisir que j'accède à votre requête, mais n'allez pas croire pour autant que vous êtes {mf|le bienvenu|la bienvenue} sur le monde déchu. Pour nous, vous ne valez pas mieux que la mon-keigh à trois yeux. Je vous autorise à rester jusqu'au chant funèbre, mais pas au-delà. Et uniquement parce que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}certains de mes semblables vous trouvent {mf|amusant|amusante}{/d}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands and says to you,{/n} "It will be my pleasure to satisfy your request. But do not think that you are any more welcome on the Crone World than the three-eyed mon-keigh. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'arlequin appuie sur un bouton de l'étrange appareil qu'il tient en main, puis vous dit :{/n} « C'est avec plaisir que j'accède à votre requête, mais n'allez pas croire pour autant que vous êtes {mf|le bienvenu|la bienvenue} sur le monde déchu. Pour nous, vous ne valez pas mieux que la mon-keigh à trois yeux. Je vous autorise à rester jusqu'au chant funèbre, mais pas au-delà. Et uniquement parce que certains de mes semblables vous trouvent {mf|amusant|amusante}. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}El Arlequín aprieta un botón del extraño dispositivo en su mano y lo mantiene presionado. Se dirige a ti:{/n} «Será un placer satisfacerte, pero no creas que por ello eres bienvenid{mf|o|a} en el mundo ancestral. Lo abandonarás tan pronto como acabe su réquiem, y únicamente porque {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}algunos de mis hermanos y hermanas te consideran interesante{/d}».
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands and says to you,{/n} "It will be my pleasure to satisfy your request. But do not think that you are any more welcome on the Crone World than the three-eyed mon-keigh. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arlequín aprieta un botón del extraño dispositivo en su mano y lo mantiene presionado. Se dirige a ti:{/n} «Será un placer satisfacerte, pero no creas que por ello eres bienvenid{mf|o|a} en el mundo ancestral. Lo abandonarás tan pronto como acabe su réquiem, y únicamente porque algunos de mis hermanos y hermanas te consideran interesante».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Der Harlekin drückt eine Taste auf dem merkwürdigen Gerät in seiner Hand, hält sie gedrückt und sagt zu dir:{/n} "Es wird mir ein Vergnügen sein, Eure Bitte zu erfüllen. Aber glaubt nicht, dass Ihr auf der Hexenwelt willkommener seid als der dreiäugige Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr werdet gehen, sobald das Klagelied gesungen ist. Und nur, weil {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}einige meiner Brüder und Schwestern Euch amüsant finden{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands and says to you,{/n} "It will be my pleasure to satisfy your request. But do not think that you are any more welcome on the Crone World than the three-eyed mon-keigh. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Harlekin drückt eine Taste auf dem merkwürdigen Gerät in seiner Hand, hält sie gedrückt und sagt zu dir:{/n} "Es wird mir ein Vergnügen sein, Eure Bitte zu erfüllen. Aber glaubt nicht, dass Ihr auf der Hexenwelt willkommener seid als der dreiäugige Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr werdet gehen, sobald das Klagelied gesungen ist. Und nur, weil einige meiner Brüder und Schwestern Euch amüsant finden."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Arleken, elindeki tuhaf cihazın üzerindeki bir düğmeye basıp ardından basılı tutarak seninle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu isteğini yerine getirmek, benim için bir zevktir. Lakin bu Acuze Dünya'da sen de üç gözlü mon-keighler gibi hoş karşılanmıyorsun. Ağıt sona erer ermez buradan gideceksin. Sırf {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}bazı kardeşlerimi eğlendirdiğin için{/d} canını bağışlıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands and says to you,{/n} "It will be my pleasure to satisfy your request. But do not think that you are any more welcome on the Crone World than the three-eyed mon-keigh. You will walk away as soon as the dirge is sung. And only because {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}some of my brothers and sisters find you amusing{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Arleken, elindeki tuhaf cihazın üzerindeki bir düğmeye basıp basılı tutarak seninle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu isteğini yerine getirmek, benim için bir zevktir. Lakin bu Acuze Dünya'da senin de üç gözlü mon-keighlerden daha hoş karşılanacağını sanma. Ağıt sona erer ermez buradan gideceksin. Sırf {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}bazı kardeşlerimi eğlendirdiğin için{/d} canını bağışlıyorum."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
